mapper.update: update webattachment set attLink =#{attLink} where easid=#{id} and ORIGINALFILENAME like '%#{attName}%'
mapper.select: select att.FNAME_L2 as title,att.FNUMBER as num,att.FSIZE as fileSize, att.fsimplename as fileType,att.FREMOTEPATH as webUrl, ass.FBOID as easId,att.FCREATETIME as createTime, att.FDESCRIPTION_L2 as description from T_BAS_BoAttchAsso ass left join T_BAS_Attachment att on ass.FATTACHMENTID=att.FID where ass.FBOID=#{id} and att.FNAME_L2 is not null order by att.FREMOTEPATH
